net.consensys.cava.rlp

Interface RLPWriter


  • public interface RLPWriter
    A writer for encoding values to RLP.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void writeBigInteger(java.math.BigInteger value)
      Write a big integer to the output.
      default void writeByteArray(byte[] value)
      Encode a byte array to RLP.
      default void writeInt(int value)
      Write an integer to the output.

      Write a list of values.

      Write a long to the output.

      Append an already RLP encoded value.

      Write a string to the output.
      default void writeUInt256(UInt256 value)
      Write a UInt256 to the output.

      Encode a Bytes value to RLP.

    • Method Detail

      • writeRLP

        void writeRLP(Bytes value)
        Append an already RLP encoded value.

        Note that this method may not validate that value is a valid RLP sequence. Appending an invalid RLP sequence will cause the entire RLP encoding produced by this writer to also be invalid.

        Parameters:
        value - The RLP encoded bytes to append.

      • writeValue

        void writeValue(Bytes value)
        Encode a Bytes value to RLP.
        Parameters:
        value - The byte array to encode.

      • writeByteArray

        default void writeByteArray(byte[] value)
        Encode a byte array to RLP.
        Parameters:
        value - The byte array to encode.

      • writeInt

        default void writeInt(int value)
        Write an integer to the output.
        Parameters:
        value - The integer to write.

      • writeLong

        void writeLong(long value)
        Write a long to the output.
        Parameters:
        value - The long value to write.

      • writeUInt256

        default void writeUInt256(UInt256 value)
        Write a UInt256 to the output.
        Parameters:
        value - The UInt256 value to write.

      • writeBigInteger

        default void writeBigInteger(java.math.BigInteger value)
        Write a big integer to the output.
        Parameters:

      • writeString

        default void writeString(java.lang.String str)
        Write a string to the output.
        Parameters:

      • writeList

        void writeList(java.util.function.Consumer<RLPWriter> fn)
        Write a list of values.
        Parameters:
        fn - A consumer that will be provided with a RLPWriter that can consume values.
